command.command: select utl_inaddr.get_host_address || '_' || instance_name from v$instance
root\cimv2::SELECT Caption from Win32_OperatingSystem
root\cimv2::SELECT Name FROM Win32_ComputerSystem
root\cimv2::SELECT TotalVisibleMEMorySize FROM Win32_OperatingSystem
root\cimv2::SELECT FreePhysicalMemory from Win32_OperatingSystem
/opt/Wiserv/script/appinfo.sh oracle
root\cimv2::select WorkingSet from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like 'oracle'
root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like 'oracle'
select utl_inaddr.get_host_address || '_' || instance_name from v$instance
select version from v$instance
select * from v$nls_parameters
select length(address) from v$sql where rownum<2
select created from v$database
select startup_time from v$instance
select host_name from v$instance
select sysdate - startup_time from v$instance
select instance_name from v$instance
select name from v$database
select nvl(value,'-') from v$parameter where name = 'db_domain'
select open_mode from v$database
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'sorts (disk)'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'sorts (memory)'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'transaction rollbacks'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'user commits'
select round(sum(bytes)/1024/1024,2) from v$sgastat where name='buffer_cache'
select round(current_size/1024/1024,2) from v$sga_dynamic_components where component='shared pool'
select round(sum(bytes) / 1024 / 1024,2) from v$sgastat where pool='large pool'
select round(sum(bytes) / 1024 / 1024,2) from v$sgastat where pool='java pool'
select round(sum(bytes) / 1024 / 1024,2) from v$sgastat where name='log_buffer'

select round((s1+s2)/1024/1024,2) from (select sum(bytes) s1 from v$sgastat where (not (pool ='shared pool')) or pool is null) a,(select current_size s2 from v$sga_dynamic_components where component='shared pool') b
select round(value/1024/1024,2) from v$parameter where name = 'pga_aggregate_target'
select round(value/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='physical reads'
select round(value/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='physical writes'
select round(value/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='db block gets'
select round(value/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='consistent gets'
select round(value/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name ='parse count (total)'
select round(sum(value/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60)),2) from v$sysstat,v$instance b where name in('user rollbacks','user commits')
select value from v$sysstat where name ='physical reads'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='physical writes'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='db block gets'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='consistent gets'
select value from v$sysstat where name = 'parse count (total)'
select sum(value) from v$sysstat where name in('user rollbacks','user commits')
select round(sum(bytes)/1024/1024/1024,2) sumtotal from dba_data_files
select count(distinct group#) from v$log
select round(sumsize/groupcount,2) avgsize from (select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 sumsize from v$log) a,(select count(distinct group#) groupcount from v$log) b
select nvl(round(sum(blocks*block_size)/1024/1024/1024,2),0) archivetotsize from v$archived_log where status='A'
select * from (select distinct SUBSTR(name,0,INSTR(TRANSLATE(name, '\', '/'), '/', -1, 1)) file_path from v$archived_log where status='A') where file_path is not null
select 1 from dual
select count(*) from dba_tablespaces where contents not in('TEMPORARY')
select count(*) from dba_data_files
select log_mode from v$database
select decode((a.value+b.value),0,0,round(a.value/(a.value+b.value)*100,2)) from v$pgastat a,v$pgastat b where a.name = 'bytes processed' and b.name = 'extra bytes read/written'
select round((1-(sum(getmisses)/sum(gets))),4) * 100 HitRatio from v$rowcache
select decode(sum(pins),0,0,round(100*(1 - sum(reloads)/sum(pins)),2)) from sys.v_$librarycache

select decode((b.value+c.value),0,0,round(100*(1 - a.value/(b.value+c.value)),2)) from (select value from sys.v_$sysstat where name='physical reads') a, (select value from sys.v_$sysstat where name='db block gets') b,(select value from sys.v_$sysstat where name='consistent gets') c
select round((1 - bytes/summem)*100,2) fct from v$sgastat a,(select current_size summem from v$sga_dynamic_components where component='shared pool') b where pool='shared pool' and name='free memory'
select count(*) from v$session
select count(*) from v$process
select value from v$sysstat where name ='logons cumulative'
select value from v$sysstat where name ='opened cursors current'
select count(*) from v$session where lockwait is not null
select count(*) from v$lock
select value from v$sysstat where name ='enqueue deadlocks'

select total.file_id,round(100*(total.sumspace-free.freespace)/total.sumspace,2) from (select file_id,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as freespace from dba_free_space group by file_id) free,(select file_id,file_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as sumspace from dba_data_files group by file_id,file_name) total where free.file_id=total.file_id
select (select value from v$sysstat where statistic#=142)/(select sum(value) from v$sysstat where statistic# in(91,137,140,142)) redowait from dual
select PARALLEL from v$instance
select sql_text,EXECUTIONS from (select sql_text,EXECUTIONS from v$sqlarea order by EXECUTIONS desc) where rownum<=10
select a.value from v$sesstat a,v$statname b where (b.name like '%uga%' or b.name like '%pga%') and a.statistic# = b.statistic# order by sid
select max(BLOCKS) from dba_free_space
select sum(PHYRDS+PHYWRTS) from v$filestat
select sum(READTIM+WRITETIM) from v$filestat
select COUNT(*) from v$session where status='INACTIVE'
select tablespace_name from dba_tablespaces where contents not in('TEMPORARY')
select tablespace_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 from dba_data_files group by tablespace_name

select tot.tablespace_name,round(tot.total - free.free,2) used_space from (select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1024/1024) total from sys.dba_data_files group by tablespace_name) tot,(select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1024/1024) free from sys.dba_free_space group by tablespace_name) free where free.tablespace_name = tot.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,file_name from dba_data_files
select tablespace_name,status from dba_tablespaces
select tablespace_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 from dba_data_files group by tablespace_name

select tot.tablespace_name,round(100 - (free.free/tot.total)*100,2) used_pct from (select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1048576) total from sys.dba_data_files group by tablespace_name) tot,(select tablespace_name,(sum(bytes)/1048576) free from sys.dba_free_space group by tablespace_name) free where free.tablespace_name=tot.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sqrt(max(blocks)/sum(blocks))*(100/sqrt(sqrt(count(blocks)))) FSFI from dba_free_space group by tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sum(phyrds) rds from v$filestat a,dba_data_files b where a.FILE#=b.file_id group by b.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sum(phywrts) wrts from v$filestat a,dba_data_files b where a.FILE#=b.file_id group by b.tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,sum(blocks) from dba_free_space group by tablespace_name
select tablespace_name,autoextensible from dba_data_files
select file_id from dba_data_files
select file_id,file_name from dba_data_files
select file_id,autoextensible from dba_data_files
select file_id,round(bytes/1024/1024,2) from dba_data_files

select total.file_id,(case when (round((total.sumspace - free.freespace),2)='') then 0 else round((total.sumspace - free.freespace),2) end) from (select file_id,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as freespace from dba_free_space group by file_id) free,(select file_id,file_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as sumspace from dba_data_files group by file_id,file_name) total where free.file_id=total.file_id
select a.file#,round(phyblkrd/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60),2) from v$filestat a,v$instance b
select a.file#,round(phyblkwrt/((sysdate - b.startup_time)*24*60*60),2) from v$filestat a,v$instance b
select file_id,status from dba_data_files
select file_id,bytes/1024/1024 file_size from dba_data_files

select total.file_id,(case when (round(100*(total.sumspace-free.freespace)/total.sumspace,2)='') then 0 else round(100*(total.sumspace-free.freespace)/total.sumspace,2) end) from (select file_id,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as freespace from dba_free_space group by file_id) free,(select file_id,file_name,sum(bytes)/1024/1024 as sumspace from dba_data_files group by file_id,file_name) total where free.file_id=total.file_id
select instance_name from v$instance
select name from v$bgprocess
select name,description from v$bgprocess
select name,paddr from v$bgprocess

select * from (select distinct SUBSTR(file_name,0,INSTR(TRANSLATE(file_name, '\', '/'), '/', -1, 1)) file_path from (select file_name, 'dbfile' file_type from dba_data_files union select member, 'redolog' from v$logfile union select name, 'archlog' from v$archived_log where status='A')) where file_path is not null

select file_name,file_type from (select distinct SUBSTR(file_name,0,INSTR(TRANSLATE(file_name, '\', '/'), '/', -1, 1)) file_name,file_type from (select file_name, 'datafile' file_type from dba_data_files union select member, 'redolog' from v$logfile union select name, 'archivelog' from v$archived_log))
select group# from v$log
select group#,bytes/1024/1024 redo_size from v$log
select group#,member from v$logfile
select group#,archived from v$log
select group#,status from v$log
select a.GROUP#,FIRST_CHANGE#,FIRST_TIME from v$log a,v$logfile b where a.group#=b.group#
select NAME,EXTENTS,STATUS,CURBLK from v$rollstat,v$rollname where v$rollstat.USN=v$rollname.USN
SELECT SEGMENT_NAME, STATUS FROM dba_rollback_segs
select SID,USERNAME,SCHEMANAME,MACHINE,OSUSER,TYPE,PROGRAM,LOGON_TIME,STATUS from v$session
select sid, value from v$sesstat where statistic#=314
select sid, SUM(value) from v$sesstat where statistic# >243 and statistic# < 251 group by sid
select sid, value from v$sesstat where statistic# = 4
select sid, count(*) from v$open_cursor group by sid

select distinct a.sid,1-abs((select value from v$sesstat where v$sesstat.statistic#=54 and v$sesstat.sid = a.sid) -(select value from v$sesstat where v$sesstat.statistic#=56 and v$sesstat.sid = a.sid) -(select value from v$sesstat where v$sesstat.statistic#=120 and v$sesstat.sid = a.sid))/(select DECODE(value,0,1000000,value) from v$sesstat where v$sesstat.statistic#=9 and v$sesstat.sid = a.sid) rate from v$sesstat a
select sid, value from v$sesstat where statistic# = 54
select sid, value from v$sesstat where statistic# = 9
select sid, value from v$sesstat where statistic# = 132
select sid, value from v$sesstat where statistic# = 5
select sid, sum(value) from v$sesstat where statistic# in(11,12,43,46,161) group by sid
select sid, sum(value) from v$sesstat where statistic# in(20,21,25,26,324,341) group by sid
select sid, SUM(value) from v$sesstat where statistic# in (14,15,16,17,142,171) group by sid
select JOB, BROKEN, FAILURES, INSTANCE, LAST_DATE, LAST_SEC, NEXT_DATE, NEXT_SEC, TOTAL_TIME, LOG_USER, PRIV_USER, SCHEMA_USER from dba_jobs

SELECT T1.INSTANCE_NUMBER,T1.INSTANCE_NAME,T1.HOST_NAME,CASE WHEN T2.INSTANCE_NUMBER>0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ISONLINE,UTL_INADDR.get_host_address(T1.HOST_NAME) FROM gv$instance T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN v$instance T2 ON T1.INSTANCE_NUMBER=T2.INSTANCE_NUMBER
select sql_text from (select sql_text,cpu_time/executions/1000 cputime from v$sql where executions>0 order by cputime desc) where rownum<=10
select sql_text from (select sql_text ,disk_reads/executions diskreads from v$sql where executions>0 order by diskreads desc) where rownum<=10
select sql_text from (select sql_text ,buffer_gets/executions buffer_get from v$sql where executions>0 order by buffer_get desc) where rownum<=10
select sql_text from (select sql_text ,elapsed_time/executions elapse_time from v$sql where executions>0 order by elapse_time desc) where rownum<=10
SELECT PARSING_SCHEMA_NAME,SQL_FULLTEXT,HASH_VALUE,DISK_READS,BUFFER_GETS,SORTS,FETCHES,EXECUTIONS,FIRST_LOAD_TIME,SHARABLE_MEM,RUNTIME_MEM,ADDRESS,CPU_TIME FROM V$SQLAREA
select OBJECT_NAME,OBJECT_TYPE,CREATED,LAST_DDL_TIME from dba_objects where status!='VALID'
select OWNER,NAME,TYPE,SHARABLE_MEM,LOADS,EXECUTIONS,LOCKS,PINS,KEPT from v$db_object_cache

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 数据库连接正常
物理读速率恢复正常，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 物理读速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 物理读速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 物理写速率恢复正常，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 物理写速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 物理写速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 每秒SQL解析次数恢复正常，当前值为${value}次/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 每秒SQL解析次数大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}次/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 每秒SQL解析次数大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}次/秒。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 每秒事务数恢复正常，当前值为${value}次/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 每秒事务数大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}次/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 每秒事务数大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}次/秒。

kpipolicy.alertdesc2: 表空间个数发生变化，从${oldvalue}个变更为${value}个。
数据文件个数发生变化，从${oldvalue}个变更为${value}个。
归档模式发生变化，从${oldvalue}变更为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 库缓存命中率恢复正常，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 库缓存命中率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 库缓存命中率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 高速缓冲缓存命中率恢复正常，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 高速缓冲缓存命中率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 高速缓冲缓存命中率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 数据字典缓存命中率恢复正常，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 数据字典缓存命中率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 数据字典缓存命中率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 内存排序比率恢复正常，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 内存排序比率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 内存排序比率小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 死锁数恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 死锁数大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 死锁数大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 事务回滚率恢复正常，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 事务回滚率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 事务回滚率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: Oracle CPU利用率恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: Oracle CPU利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: Oracle CPU利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: Oracle CPU利用率恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: Oracle CPU利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: Oracle CPU利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: Oracle内存利用率恢复正常。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: Oracle内存利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: Oracle内存利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: Oracle内存利用率恢复正常。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: Oracle内存利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: Oracle内存利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: ${childname}表空间状态恢复正常。
${childname}表空间增长率恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: ${childname}表空间增长率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: ${childname}表空间增长率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: ${childname}表空间利用率恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: ${childname}表空间利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: ${childname}表空间利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: FSFI恢复正常，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: FSFI小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: FSFI小于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}%。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 物理读速率恢复正常，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 物理读速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 物理读速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: 物理写速率恢复正常，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 物理写速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 物理写速率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}块/秒。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: ${childname}数据文件状态恢复正常。
${childname}数据文件增长率恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: ${childname}数据文件增长率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: ${childname}数据文件增长率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: ${childname}数据文件利用率恢复正常，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc3: ${childname}数据文件利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: ${childname}数据文件利用率大于等于${trigervalue1}，当前值为${value}。

kpipolicy.alertdesc1: ${childname}日志文件组状态恢复正常。
${childname}回滚状态恢复正常。
